hooks.command: if [ -f .ai-workspace/tasks/active/ACTIVE_TASKS.md ]; then MODIFIED=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$MODIFIED" -gt 2 ]; then echo "$MODIFIED uncommitted changes. Consider: /aisdlc-checkpoint-tasks"; fi; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'git commit' 2>/dev/null; then if ! echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'REQ-[A-Z]+-' 2>/dev/null; then echo 'Commit may be missing REQ tag. Consider: /aisdlc-commit-task'; fi; fi
